titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1997, the existing suspension of duty on mercuric oxide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/25/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1996, the suspension of duty on mercuric oxide.
